name: Beat The Robot Remake
description:
Beat The Robot

The Story of the Game 

You was Create A Robot but The Problem was The Glitch Get In Your Robot And Then The Robot Get Some Glitch But You will Say Why The Robots Get Glitch?

Because You Was create a Robot but this was This IS YOUR FIRST ROBOT he was Color is Blue  Soo You Give Him Some Glitch Because You was Evil And Then he want to kill you and Then you Run And Then The Robot Blue He Was Create A Robots When You Leave And Make The Robots Evil Like You They Give Him Some Glitch  And He Create Some Robots You Will see In The Game   And Then You Buy Some Weapons To kill All The Robots  So What Are You Waiting For GO BUY THE GAME NOW!!!!!!!!

The Game Created by Mohamed H

Music by Alex

the controllers

W A S D = Move

space = Jump

Left click = shoot

Alt with F4 = Close The game
